log.error: Error importing XML: 'There is no XML format with name: 'XHTML-TRANSACTIONS' (ERR0206)' (ERR0257)

xmlText.p: BOSTON RED SOX — Traded OF Bryce Brentz to Pittsburgh for cash.
MINNESOTA TWINS — Placed RHP Trevor May on the 60-day DL. Agreed to terms with RHP Anibal Sanchez on a one-year contract.
ARIZONA DIAMONDBACKS — Placed RHP Shelby Miller on the 60-day DL.
ATLANTA BRAVES — Designated RHP Mauricio Cabrera for assignment. Agreed to terms with RHP Peter Moylan.
PITTSBURGH PIRATES — Placed RHP Nick Burdi on the 60-day DL.
SAN FRANCISCO GIANTS — Designated RHP Joan Gregorio for assignment.<
LINCOLN SALTDOGS — Signed RHP Tyler Herron.
ST. PAUL SAINTS — Signed INF Brady Shoemaker.
SIOUX CITY EXPLORERS — Signed INF Nelson Ward.
WICHITA WINGNUTS — Signed 1B Luis Jimenez and OF Stephen Aluko. Traded OF Richard Prigatano to Sugar Land (Atlantic) for a player to be named.
WINNIPEG GOLDEYES — Signed LHP Kevin McGovern.<
LONG ISLAND DUCKS — Signed LHP Bennett Parry.<
ROCKLAND BOULDERS — Signed RHP Markus Solbach.<
CHARLOTTE HORNETS — Fired general manager Rich Cho.<
JACKSONVILLE JAGUARS — Exercised their 2018 options on TE Marcedes Lewis and OL Tyler Shatley and Josh Wells.
TAMPA BAY BUCCANEERS — Released RB Doug Martin.<
EDMONTON ESKIMOS — Re-signed DB Aaron Grymes to a one-year contract.
WINNIPEG BLUE BOMBERS — Signed DB Tevin Homer and WR Corey Washington.<
CALGARY FLAMES — Reassigned F Morgan Klimchuk to Stockton (AHL).
DETROIT RED WINGS — Recalled G Jared Coreau from Grand Rapids (AHL).
NEW YORK RANGERS — Traded D Nick Holden to Boston for D Rob O'Gara and a 2018 third-round draft pick.
VANCOUVER CANUCKS — Signed D Erik Gudbranson to a three-year contract extension.<
AHL — Suspended Syracuse F Alex Gallant two games.
HARTFORD WOLF PACK — Signed D Joey Leach to a professional tryout agreement.
LEHIGH VALLEY PHANTOMS — Recalled F Alex Krushelnyski on loan from Reading (ECHL).<
SEATTLE SOUNDERS — Signed M/F Lamar Neagle and G Calle Brown.<
NCAA — Upheld sanctions on Louisville's men's basketball program, which include vacating its 2013 NCAA championship and 123 victories between 2012-15.
MICHIGAN — Named Jim McElwain wide receivers coach.
MISSISSIPPI STATE — Announced the resignation of baseball coach Andy Cannizaro. Promoted pitching coach Gary Henderson to interim head coach.
PENN STATE — Promoted trainer Renee Messina to assistant athletic director for athletic training services.
